summary: An attorney defends a hoodlum of murder, using the oppressiveness of the slums to appeal to the court.
cast: Humphrey Bogart|John Derek|George Macready|Allene Roberts|Candy Toxton|Mickey Knox|Barry Kelley|Florence Auer|Vince Barnett|Theda Barr|Richard Bartell|Paul Baxley|Joan Baxter|Eddie Borden|Hazel Boyne|Joe Brockman|Argentina Brunetti|Charles Camp|George Chandler|Jack Clisby|Chuck Colean|Lorraine Comerford|James Conaty|Chester Conklin|Jimmy Conlin|Connie Conrad|Curt Conway|Carol Coombs|Anne Cornwall|Joan Danton|Homer Dickenson|Dudley Dickerson|Joe Dougherty|Sidney Dubin|Ann Duncan|Mary Emery|Franklyn Farnum|Al Ferguson|Sam Flint|Jody Gilbert|Sol Gorss|William Haade|Frank Hagney|Betty Hall|Joy Hallward|Chuck Hamilton|Roberta Haynes|Myron Healey|Cliff Heard|Pepe Hern|George Hickman|Al Hill|Wesley Hopper|John Indrisano|Jack Jahries|Ray Johnson|Donald Kerr|Paul Kreibich|Jane Lee|Dewey Martin|Sid Melton|Eda Reiss Merin|Frank Merlo|John Mitchum|Philip Morris|Helen Mowery|Gordon Nelson|Garry Owen|Netta Packer|Joe Palma|Eddie Parker|Beulah Parkington|Jack Perry|Lee Phelps|Rose Plumer|Ed Randolph|Davis Roberts|Franz Roehn|Dick Sinatra|Mabel Smaney|Houseley Stevenson|Brick Sullivan|Charles Sullivan|Thomas Sully|Tex Swan|Betty Taylor|Glen Thompson|Sid Tomack|Evelyn Underwood|Dorothy Vernon|Peter Virgo|Ralph Volkie|Pierre Watkin|Blackie Whiteford|Cara Williams|Sumner Williams|Dooley Wilson|Harry Wilson|Jeff York
title: Llamad a cualquier puerta
